i have played this game for close to 3000 hours, and can confidently say this is the worse state the game has ever been in, they took away skins, heroes used to be free, maps used to be good, but they replaced all of it with a battlepass, Â£20 skins, dogshit maps, and the pve that was the whole reason for making ow2 is Â£15 for 3 20min missions (if youre lucky). worst cashgrab of a game ive ever seen somehow, which is impressive bc of how bad some other games out there are
Lady's and gentleman, I present you the game that will [strike](at least was supposed to)[/strike] kill Team Fortress 2.

El juego tiene lugar en un mundo de fantasÃ­a llamado "tiwat", donde los elegidos por Dios serÃ¡n galardonados con el "ojo de dios" para guiar el poder de los elementos. Encontrar compaÃ±eros con diferentes personalidades y habilidades Ãºnicas en un viaje libre, derrotar a enemigos fuertes con ellos y recuperar a familiares separados - al mismo tiempo, descubrir gradualmente la verdad del "genshin impact".

the only game which has better porn than the game itself

DespuÃ©s de solucionar el problema de las compras, ahora toca probarlo durante horas para ver el rendimiento. Este juego no es el producto que prometieron pero eso no quita el hecho de que es un juego divertido. Si es que las misiones de historia me decepciona ya cambiare mi reseÃ±a.

Still a very fun game at its core, but the monetization is ludicrous. $20 for a single skin is outrageous. Especially because Overwatch is a game where you're not supposed to main one character only, but change characters based on what your team needs. 

Skins have come up in the shop that make my wife and I go "YOOOO THAT'S SO COOL" and point at the TV like Redditers. But for $20, the price of an entire game? No way. If they were $5, I would have bought more than four by now. Instead, I've bought nothing.

I don't really care about PvE, so not having it is no big loss for me, but if you're going to scale it back to the type of events that used to be free, AND charge for it, what was the point of even making this 2? All you did was draw attention to yourself before shitting your pants.

It's still a fun game, I'm still going to play it. I just hope they manage to right the ship. It's not 2016 anymore, Overwatch isn't the golden goose it used to be. You have to win people back, and you're doing a terrible job of it.

I played this game since 2017. I paid 60 bucks for it. I mean this sincerely when I say that this game is no longer worth it, not even for free. Please, don't ever become like me and give this game so much of your time. 

I was Overwatch free for 3 months and it was the happiest 3 months of my life.
I got cancer after playing this

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

[h1] Blizzard are pioneering the games industry with the most consumer friendly and truely incredible business practices<3 [/h1]

I love the way they released this microtransaction simulator and also removed all forms of progression and levelling in the game. I think its really revolutionary how you are rewarded with absolutely nothing for playing free to play and also the way we are all blessed with the privilege to pay a mere $15 for a whopping 3 missions!! Blizzard have also proven to have the best game balancing team world-wide, with their almost magical ability to buff overpowered characters and abandon the underpowered and useless ones!! Truely and overwatch experience 9,999,999/10, im so glad i payed for overwatch 1 on multiple platforms

Yes I download and open the game JUST SO I CAN GIVE IT A NEGATIVE REVIEW
Would love to play if Blizzard can give my freaking account back
